alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. Helena, northeastern Livingston and northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 350 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montpelier, or 11 miles southwest of Amite, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Roseland, Montpelier, Darlington and Tangipahoa. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 43 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena
